entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • exclude markdown changes from triggering a build in pipeline #25664
  • Building legacy iOS projects fails with latest Mono and .NET 6.0.300 SDK #25651
  • [ARM64] With SDK 3.1.420 and 6.0.301 installed, failed to load the dll from [C:\Program Files\dotnet\host\fxr\6.0.6\hostfxr.dll], HRESULT: 0x800700C1 when dotnet run 3.1 project #25649

Closed

  • dotnet test adds a stray quotation mark to the -property:VSTestResultsDirectory property in 7.0.100-preview2 #24999
  • dotnet workload install fails to recognize new workload manifest #25629

PullRequests

Created

  • Allow dotnet workload update print-download-link-only to work with when update available in newer feature band #25669
    Area-Workloads
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #25650
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #25626
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Implement new flag for ignoreing apphosts in dotnet run #25647
    Area-CLI
  • Implement functionality for templating workload and version constraints #25505
    Area-Infrastructure
